data.text: @AlvaroRG83 Hi, please send us your booking code via PM so that we check your booking for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@thomas_wagner @ThaiAirways Hi Thomas, we are really sorry for the inconvenience caused by your missing luggage. Unfortunately, we - the Social Media Team cannot assist with locating the luggage. Please contact the local Lost & Found for assistance. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah
@maikduennbier Hi Maik, we are really sorry that you did not get the seats that you paid for. Please send us your booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah

@hosileh Hi, we are really sorry for the inconvenience caused by your missing luggage. Unfortunately, we - the Social Media Team cannot assist with locating the luggage. Please contact the local Lost & Found for assistance. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah
@dashthaci Hi there, please don't share your booking code publicly due to privacy reasons. Plase write us a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Funda
@taifbehnam96 Hi there, please send us your booking code and your new travel dates. We will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda
@DirektRo Hi, please send us your booking code and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda
@evandenanker @FlyerTalk Hi Erwin, you can send your inquiry to impressum@austrian.com and it will be forwarded to our CEO. Kind regards, Sarah

@gtooke1986 @lufthansa Hi, we cannot tell you when you will be informed. It depends on when the flight is canceled. But usually, you'll be informed as soon as a flight is canceled. Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @NikkiJTR @veneziaairport Hi Nicole, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, we - the Social media Team - can't assist in that case. Please try again contact the lost and found department. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Funda
@MCApster Hi, we are sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us your booking code in a PM and we will try to assist with rebooking. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@JimClay23873610 Hi, we are sorry to hear your flight was delayed, If you still require assistance/rebooking please send us your booking code per PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS
@Katronka Hi, I just replied to your DM. Kind regards, Sarah
@Starbirb1 Hi Carole, I am sorry that your flight got canceled. Do you still need assistance with the rebooking? If yes, please send us your booking code. Kind regards, Sarah
@evandenanker [2/2] Please contact the local Lost & Found or turn to the contact of your missing luggage report for assistance regarding locating your luggage. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah
@evandenanker [1/2] Hi Erwin, we are really sorry for the inconvenience caused by your missing luggage. Unfortunately, we - the Social Media Team cannot assist with locating the luggage.
@tcriess [2/2] Schicke uns bitte eine PN und wir schauen ob wir auch weiterhelfen können. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@tcriess [1/2] Hi, es tut uns leid, dass du uns nicht erreichen konntest. Das ist natürlich nicht der Service den wir unseren Gästen bieten möchten. Allerdings ist es zur Zeit leider so, dass wir aufgrund vermehrter Anfragen eine lange Wartezeit über alle Kanäle haben.

@mendeslia_ @lufthansa Hi there, unfortunately, the Social Media Team, has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR) as they have the information about your case. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @akchomps Hi there, please send us your booking code and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

@YiannisM2 Hi Yiannis, I'm sorry you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls. There's no covid policy. A refund/rebooking is only possible according to your booked fare conditions. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @_michaela_mayer Hi Michaela, it depends on the exact departure time. We recommend being at the airport 3 hours before departure. Best regards, Christiane

@stephzorba Hi, when you reported the missing walker you must've received a "PIR (Passenger Irregularity Report)" with a contact to reach for updates. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@DejarlaisTim @AmericanAir @British_Airways Hi Tim,please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR–you’ve received the Passenger Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @dvegel Hi Dag, you can send us a DM with more information on how we can assist you. Best regards, Christiane

@zangjif Hi, unfortunately, we can not exactly tell when you will receive a response. Due to the large amount of inquiries at the moment you may experience a longer waiting time. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne
@dashthaci Hi Dash, please send us as well your booking code via a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@missmattie1896 Hi there, we're sorry that your flight has been cancelled. Please send us your booking code via PM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@theFerdi265 Hallo! Vielen Dank, dass du uns darauf hingewiesen hast! Wir haben das an unsere zuständigen KollegInnen weitergeleitet! 😅 Liebe Grüße, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @LarsLB Hi Lars, please send your inquiry about the phone via our online form https://t.co/pypFnOVPHe the bags, please contact directly the phone number on your PIR Report. Kind regards, Christine

@alvaroiserte Hi Alvaro, I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight cancellation. Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number in a DM in order to be assisted accordingly.
Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @zangjif Hi, please use this online form https://t.co/XDgRxACySX. Kind regards, Christine
@flinty3 Hi Rob, please send us the booking code via a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@romeofortacelli Hi Romeo, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we are able to have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine
@schneijs Hi Jacki, we are glad to hear your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon! Best regards, Denis
@christoph191019 Hi Christoph, we cannot tell you exactly when you will receive a response since your case has to be handled by various different departments. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @travelgroupie Hi,sorry to hear your bag did not arrive with you. in this case please contact our feedback department via https://t.co/CLg72NPXF9. Kind regards, Christine

@PeterGouverneur Hi Peter, we regret to read that. If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com, https://t.co/o3XIOQmXHr. Kind regards, Christine
@annadepablo Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @mani2785 Hi Mani, we regret to read that. Please send your inquiry via this online form https://t.co/CLg72NPXF9. Kind regards, Christine
@rsdyson Hi Richard, please send us your booking code via PM and we can take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Daphne

@basic70 Hi Daniel,I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. The Social Media team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your delayed baggage report. I hope you will re-unite with your baggage soon. Best regards, Denis
@fivezerodigital Hi Manuela, we are flying up to 5 times daily from London to Vienna. Best regards, Denis

data.text: @BruceMcAlliste1 Hi, unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to the baggage system. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR). They will have all the required information. Kind regards, Daphne

@mark_lammers Hi Mark, we are really sorry that you haven't got any answer yet. Be assured that our colleagues will get to you as soon as possible. Due to the high amount of inquiries you may experience a longer waiting time. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @pmontecchiarini  Hi Pablo, please allow me to answer in English. Please send your compensation request to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online feedback form: https://t.co/Da3U1nKxpP They will then review your matter and get back to you. Best regards, Denis
@tfouch12 @turkishairlines  Hi Timothy, how can we assist you? Please send us your booking code and information about the change you would like to make. Best regards, Denis

data.text: @paternushans  Hi Juan, we understand your frustration and we care about all our passengers and try our best to offer the best service we can. We are currently experiencing an airport staff shortage, which affects some ground handling services. Best regards, Denis
@mariagrotegoed Hi, I've just replied to your posting via DM. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Georgie_P Hi there, I'm sorry that the luggage hasn't arrived. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any baggage system. Please refer to the contact on the Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR) or fill out the form here: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne

@wolf_chr Hallo Christian, es tut uns sehr leid, dass du von einer Flugstreichung betroffen bist. Bitte schicke uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Wir sehen uns das gerne näher an. 
Liebe Grüße, Sarah

urls.title: Baggage calculator
urls.description: Your baggage allowance on scheduled flights and the cost of optional baggage varies depending on the route and the class of travel or fare booked. Use our calculator to check how much baggage you are allowed to take on scheduled flights and how to add optional baggage.

data.text:
@cathulu26 [1/2] Hi there, 
We are sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times. Have you tried booking your additional bag online?
@larryjray  Hi Larry, I've just replied via DM. Best regards, Denis

@steamingdonut Hi, we are not aware of any exceptions for London or the UK and are unsure why you are receiving this error message. Please send us a PM with details and we will try to look into how you can create the report.  Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS
@TimGarr @ExpediaHelp Hi Tim, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @LarryJRay Hi Larry, via the following link you will find our contact details: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko . You can also send us your booking code in a DM if you wish to rebook the flights or a refund of the ticket. Kind regards, Funda

@SAtoussa Hi,I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered.We are not able to assist you via social media about your missing baggage, unfortunately.Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the arrival service for any additional information.Kind regards, Christine
@andreconfiado Hi André, we recommend to be at the airport  2-3 hours before departure. Have a nice flight. Kind regards, Funda
@Christoph191019 [2/2] please be patient and refrain from contacting us more than once. Best regards, Christine

@Christoph191019 [1/2] Hi Christoph, at the moment we experience a high number of requests and there are delays in processing. Please be assured that we will take care of your request as soon as possible. If you have sent us an inquiry and we have not yet responded,

@styleschwartz Hi Julia, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered.Please contact the phone number on your PIR Report.Unfortunately,the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by https://t.co/C7j8Y6qlCM regards,Christine
@Bernhard_Baver Hi, we're glad we could help. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@rudi_cronje Hi, sorry for the delay - we are currently receiving a high number of enquiries. Please send us a PM with your booking code if we can still help you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@roussosap Hi, passengers sitting in the emergency exit row cannot store their luggage underneath the seat in front of them for safety reasons so space has to be made/kept in the overhead compartments for their luggage. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@steamingdonut Hi Julie, please try it again and use a different browser. Kind regards, Christine
@MLEstew Hi Emily, please don't share your booking code publicly due to privacy reasons. Please write us a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine

@roussosap Hi Andreas, what do you mean by "Reserved overhead lockers for two passengers in the economy class?" In case there is no space in the overhead compartment we(our crew) recommend storing your baggage underneath the seat in front of you. Kind regards, Christine

@kayperbeats @GB_Baseball @WBSCEurope @brianlainoff Hi Drew, sorry to hear your bag did not arrive with you. Please contact directly the number on your PIR Report. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Best regards, Christine

@Schmu2612 Liebe Nicole,
Leider erhalten wir viele Anrufe, sodass die Wartezeiten länger als normal sind. Wir können Dich nur um Deine Geduld bitten. 
Bitte sende uns Deinen Buchungscode und wir versuchen Dir hier zuhelfen.
Liebe Grüße
Alessandra
@gorgeousjack [2/2] Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.Kind regards, Christine

@gorgeousjack [1/2] Hi Jack,sorry to hear your bag did not arrive with you.Unfortunately the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Passenger Irregularity
@michbsd Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

@hosileh Hi, we regret to read that you didn't receive any update yet.Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.Please try to contact directly our colleagues from the arrival service.Kind regards, Christine
@ajcollins113 Hi, sorry to hear your bag did not arrive with you. Please mind that our telephone lines are currently overloaded. Kindly try it again a bit later. Kind regards, Christine
@MrsEntwistle Hi, please contact our colleagues from the PIR Report. Kind regards, Christine

@c_kronenberg [2/2] Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode, damit wir dir an dieser Stelle weiterhelfen können.
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @rollingred765 Hi there, here you can find our worldwide telephone numbers: https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt Kind regards, Daphne
@mrsentwistle Hi there, if the bag was already found, then you do not have to complete the questionnaire anymore. Kind regards, Daphne
@hushyari Hi there, you can send us your booking code via PM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

@MrsEntwistle Hi Samantha, If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. The form can be found here: https://t.co/o3XIOQmXHr Best regards, Christiane
@elsmusings Hi Els, please contact the following e-mail address: vielzos@austrian.com Our colleagues will get back to you asap. Best regards, Christiane
@nayyfcb Hi, please check https://t.co/FR5dbcUumM for the current travel regulations. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@elsmusings [2/2] When you reported your missing bags you must've received a "PIR (Passenger Irregularity Report)" with a contact to reach for updates. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@elsmusings [1/2] Hi Els, we’re sincerely sorry that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. We can completely understand your anger but we can’t offer an immediate solution in this case. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you.
